# openai_project_user_role_assignments (Data Source)

Lists the project roles assigned to a user within a project.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "openai_project_user_role_assignments" "test" {
  project_id = "proj_abc123"
  user_id    = "user_abc123"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `project_id` (String) The ID of the project to inspect.
- `user_id` (String) The ID of the user to inspect.

### Read-Only

- `roles` (Attributes Set) List of project roles assigned to the group within the project. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--roles))

<a id="nestedatt--roles"></a>
### Nested Schema for `roles`

Read-Only:

- `description` (String) Description of the role.
- `id` (String) Identifier for the role.
- `name` (String) Unique name for the role.
- `permissions` (Set of String) Permissions granted by the role.
- `predefined_role` (Boolean) Whether the role is predefined and managed by OpenAI.
- `resource_type` (String) Resource type the role is bound to (for example `api.organization` or `api.project`).
